data.name: eXceed 3rd - Jade Penetrate Black Package Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack to the outstanding bullet hell game "eXceed 3rd - Jade Penetrate Black Package", created by Tennen-sozai and localized into English and published by Nyu Media Ltd.

Includes 12 remixes of tracks from the original release "eXceed 3rd – Jade Penetrate", PLUS 4 new tracks, including “Providence”, the theme for Black Package’s ultimate boss, Undead Lord Remedy.

Tracklist:

1. Wild Wings - Remix (05:00)
2. White Beelzebub - Remix (03:23)
3. FlY UP - Remix (04:13)
4. High Tension Beat - Remix (05:20)
5. Alice in Deep Forest - Remix (04:41)
6. Feast of Frenzy - Remix (04:45)
7. Maid To Order - Remix (04:22)
8. Fierce Fight - Remix (04:34)
9. Capital Punishment Place - Remix (04:22)
10. Intersect Thunderbolt - Remix (04:30)
11. The Fate of - Remix (05:24)
12. Monolith (05:17)
13. Providence (05:19)
14. Hymnus (03:14)
15. Next Stage - Remix 01:47)
16. Curtain Call (01:47)

An uplifting mix of aural brutality and beautiful melodic metal tunes, courtesy of Saitama Saisyu Heiki!

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS:Windows Me/2000/XP/Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor:Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:NDIVIA Geforce 5200 or better, AMD(ATI) Radeon 9600 or better
  • DirectX®:8.0
  • Hard Drive:309 MB HD space
  • Sound:Standard
